wikipedia_page.main: Sir Jonathan Michael Murphy,  (born 17 June 1958) is a British academic and former senior police officer. Since 2016, he has been Professor of Advanced Policing Studies at Liverpool John Moores University. He was the Chief Constable of Merseyside Police from 2010 to 2016.

response: *Sir Jon Murphy (police officer) (born 1958), British police officer, Chief Constable of Merseyside
*Jon Murphy (fighter) (born 1977), American mixed martial arts fighter
